name: Sonic Advance Zero
description:
Sonic is starting on a brand new adventure along with his friends: Tails, Knuckles and Amy! Eggman is up to no good again and you must stop him before the world gets taken away in his own hands forever.

CAN YOU HELP SONIC AND HIS FRIENDS?

This game is more a experiment to see what I am capable of along with inspiration from different games. This game is not just a pyschologial horror.  It's my tribute to my love to not only the Sonic franchise but to video games in general in my own weird way. 

Hope you can figure it out and enjoy it. 

(Actual Game Folder is in "www")

*WINRAR IS REQUIRED*

It is highly recommended you play this game blindly. Let's Plays are allowed.
You can leave a link here if you have.

WARNING: This game is not good for the faint of heart or who suffer from epilepsy.

This game is only for PC. Windows.

#sonic #fangame #horror #psychologicalhorror
